entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
